  • Unboxing: Samsung AllShare Cast Dongle

    Submitted by dzieyzone on Wed, 02/06/2013 - 00:58
    External Link: 
    http://blog.widgetcity.com.ph/unboxing-samsung-allshare-cast-dongle/

    Early this week, I got this cool AllShare Cast Dongle for review. The AllShare Cast Dongle (or AllShare Cast Hub for other countries) allows Samsung devices with AllShare Cast feature to stream contents wirelessly to HDTV or other HDMI devices. Some Samsung gadgets with AllShare Cast features include Samsung Galaxy SIII, Samsung Galaxy Note 2 and Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1.
